data: At Point Fullerton, one thousand miles straight north of civilization, Sergeant William MacVeigh wrote with the stub end of a pencil between his fingers the last words of his semi-annual report to the Commissioner of the Royal Northwest Mounted Police at Regina.
Point Fullerton | Commissioner of the Royal Northwest Mounted Police | Regina
Isobel : A Romance of the Northern Trail
